content: I'm looking for some advice on camera backpacks. I've been eyeing the F-Stop Loka UL 40L to replace my current Lowepro ProTactic 450 AW, which is getting a bit worn out. I recently got back from a trip to Yosemite on February 19th and realized I need something more reliable. By the way, I took some amazing shots with my new Sony FE 24-70mm f/2.8 GM lens, which I received on February 10th.
